dcterms:description: A customized speech-activated email system designed for a single target user with high speech recognition error rates, allowing the user to send emails with recorded audio attachments.
dcterms:title: Speech-based email system

dcterms:creator: D.J. Ward
et al.
dcterms:description: A data entry interface using continuous gestures and language models for assistive technology applications.
dcterms:title: Dasher

dcterms:creator: W. Li
et al.
dcterms:description: A probabilistic dialogue modeling system for speech-enabled assistive technology applications.
dcterms:title: Probabilistic dialogue modeling for speech-enabled assistive technology

dcterms:creator: V. Young
A. Mihailidis
dcterms:description: A literature review discussing difficulties in automatic speech recognition of dysarthric speakers and implications for speech-based applications.
dcterms:title: Difficulties in automatic speech recognition of dysarthric speakers and implications for speech-based applications

dcterms:creator: Principles and Practice of Assistive Technology (PPAT)
dcterms:description: A course focused on how to make assistive technology more usable for individuals with disabilities.
dcterms:title: Principles and Practice of Assistive Technology (PPAT)
